title: Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace,"  Front Side
medium: Black marking pen, brush and watercolor/gouache (?), green crayon (?) on heavy white tracing paper
description: Four panel screen in the form of four abstract, highly decorative, colorful figures on wheels. Each figure is distinguished by individually-shaped heads and different shapes and patterns on the torso.  Reading from left to right:  figure with red elliptical head; figure with headdress of red cans and black feathers; figure with blue crown; figure with orange target head with arrow on top.  Lower half of all figures is red with black dots.
name: Drawing
